summary: The Xbox is a video game console made by Microsoft, released in 2001. It was Microsoft's first console and competed with the PlayStation 2 and Nintendo GameCube. The Xbox was powerful, using PC-like parts, and had a built-in hard drive and Ethernet for online gaming. "Halo: Combat Evolved" was a popular launch game. Despite selling well in North America, the Xbox struggled in Japan and didn't make a profit. It sold 24 million units worldwide. The Xbox's success led to future consoles: Xbox 360, Xbox One, and the Xbox Series X/S.
title: Xbox (console)
